deaModels
Class SBMC

java.lang.Object
  deaModels.SBMC

public class SBMC
extends java.lang.Object

The class implementing the SBM model. TABLE NOT UP TO DATE NEEDS MODIFICATION CURRENTLY CCR

The linear problem of the Model is as follows:

Variable Theta Lambda 1 ... Lambda n Slack 1 ... Slack p DIR RHS
Obj Coeff 1 0 0 0 0 0 0
Input 1 -Input 1,1 Input 1,1 ... Input 1, n 0 ... 0 E 0
Input i -Input i, 1 Input i, 1 ... Input i, n 0 ... 0 E 0
Ouput p 0 Output p, 1 ... Output p, n 0 ... -1 E Output p, 1

Where the input values of the DMU being optimised are put in the Theta column and timed by -1 (e.g. -Inputi 1 being the ith input of DMU1).

Author:
Hubert Virtos
